00030 static Lexicon f;

00033 struct trans_tab_struct{
00034         double relFreqF, relFreqE;
00035         unsigned int f,e;

00044 Hypothesis* pruneStack(stack < Hypothesis* > &s)
00045 {
00046         vector<Hypothesis*> v;
00047         unsigned int size = s.size();
00048         v.resize(size);
00049 
00050         for (unsigned int i=0; !s.empty(); i++)
00051         {
00052                 v[i] = s.top();
00053                 s.pop();
00054         }
00055         sort(v.begin(), v.end(), cmp_Hyp);
00056 
00057         for (unsigned int i=0; i<size && i<KEEP_N_BEST_HYPOS ;i++)
00058         {
00059                 s.push(v[i]);
00060         }
00061         //return best Hypo
00062         return v[0];
00063 }

00072 Hypothesis* searchTranslation(vector<unsigned int> &words, vector<trans_tab_struct>  &translationtab)
00073 {
00074         Hypothesis* minCostsHyp;
00075         vector< stack < Hypothesis* > > stacks;
00076         stacks.resize((words.size()+1));
00077         Hypothesis* h = new Hypothesis(NULL,0,0,0);
00078         stacks[0].push(h);
00079 
00080         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++)
00081         {
00082 
00083                 unsigned int j = 0;
00084                 // find first occurance of word[i] in transtab
00085                 while (j < translationtab.size() && words[i] != (translationtab[j].f))
00086                 {
00087                         j++;
00088                 }
00089                 unsigned int first_occ = j;
00090 
00091                 while (!stacks[i].empty())
00092                 {
00093                         Hypothesis *prev = stacks[i].top();
00094 
00095                         // make hyps for all the possible translations
00096                         j = first_occ;
00097                         bool found_at_least_one_hypo = false;
00098                         while (j < translationtab.size() && words[i] == (translationtab[j].f))
00099                         {
00100                                 found_at_least_one_hypo = true;
00101                                 Hypothesis *h = new Hypothesis(prev, translationtab[j].relFreqF, translationtab[j].relFreqE, translationtab[j].e);
00102                                 stacks[i+1].push(h);
00103                                 j++;
00104                         }
00105                         if (!found_at_least_one_hypo)
00106                         {
00107                                 // insert '(?)'
00108                                 stacks[i+1].push(new Hypothesis(prev,0, 0, 0));
00109                         }
00110                         stacks[i].pop();
00111                 }
00112                 minCostsHyp = pruneStack(stacks[i+1]);
00113 
00114         }
00115         // return best Hypothesis of the last stack
00116         return minCostsHyp;
00117 }

00119 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00120 {
00121 
00122         if (argc < 3)
00123         {
00124                 cerr << "ERROR: not enough parameters" << endl << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " translation-table source-document" << endl;
00125                 return 0; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00126         }
00127 
00128         // open files
00129         ifstream trans_tab(argv[1]);
00130         ifstream src_doc(argv[2]);
00131         if (!trans_tab.good())
00132         {
00133                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening translation table ("<< argv[1] <<") failed." << endl;
00134                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00135         }
00136         if (!src_doc.good())
00137         {
00138                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening source document ("<< argv[2] <<") failed." << endl;
00139                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00140         }
00141 
00142         unsigned int i = 0;
00143         vector<struct trans_tab_struct> trans_tab_vec;
00144         trans_tab_vec.resize(VECTOR_INIT_SIZE);
00145         string line;
00146 
00147         // read trans_tab into trans_tab_vec
00148         while (getline(trans_tab, line))
00149         {
00150                 struct trans_tab_struct current;
00151                 double temp;
00152                 // line is formatted like: <double> <double> # <string> # <string>
00153 
00154                 vector<string> line_vec = stringSplit(line, " ");
00155 
00156                 istringstream isstrF(line_vec[0]);
00157                 isstrF >> temp;
00158                 current.relFreqF = temp;
00159 
00160                 istringstream isstrE(line_vec[1]);
00161                 isstrE >> temp;
00162                 current.relFreqE = temp;
00163 
00164                 current.f = f.insertWord(line_vec[3]);
00165 
00166                 current.e = e.insertWord(line_vec[5]);
00167 
00168                 if (i >= trans_tab_vec.size())
00169                 {
00170                         trans_tab_vec.resize(trans_tab_vec.size() + VECTOR_RESIZE);
00171                 }
00172                 trans_tab_vec[i] = current;
00173                 // cout << f.getWord(current.f) << " " << current.relFreqF << endl;
00174                 i++;
00175         }
00176         trans_tab_vec.resize(i);
00177 
00178         // translate src_doc
00179         while (getline(src_doc, line))
00180         {
00181                 vector<string> stringwords = stringSplit(line, " ");
00182                 vector<unsigned int> words(stringwords.size(), 0);
00183 
00184                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < stringwords.size(); i++)
00185                 {
00186                         words[i] = f.getNum(stringwords[i]);
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 Hypothesis* transHyp = searchTranslation(words, trans_tab_vec);
00190 
00191                 string translation = "";
00192                 while (transHyp->prevHyp != NULL)
00193                 {
00194                         translation = e.getWord(transHyp->trans) + " " + translation;
00195                         transHyp = transHyp->prevHyp;
00196                 }
00197                 cout << translation << endl;
00198         }
00199 
00200         return 0; //EXIT_SUCCESS;
00201 }
